a.title: Click here to view in spanish

p.span: District schools will be closed through May 22, 2020 due to the Coronavirus Pandemic. Although the buildings will be closed to students, remote learning for all students has been implemented since Wednesday, March 25th. All students will be provided quality lessons virtually from their teacher(s) to be completed remotely and submitted from their homes. Please check the website and official social media accounts often for more updates on the District's Remote Learning Plan.

span.span: Castleberry ISD will again offer a full day Pre-Kindergarten (Pre-K) program for the 2020-2021 school year for eligible students. . Qualify your child for Pre-K and/or register your child for Kindergarten by completing the

p.span: Due to the COVID-19 crisis and in an effort to keep their pediatric patients and families safe, all JPS School Based Health Centers will be closed until further notice effective Friday 3/27. Patients and their families in need of services, can call 817-702-1100 and be routed to a pediatric provider that can assist them virtually via telehealth services.

tr.td: Check for updates on the district's plan of action and a timeline of communications concerning the Coronavirus outbreak.
Parents and students visit the district's at home daily lesson activities. Remote learning for all students begins Wednesday, March 25th.
Beginning Monday, March 23rd at 11:30 AM, CISD will provide curbside breakfast, lunch, and dinner for students 18 years and younger.
Visit this webpage for updates on technical work orders, to request a computer or Internet access, or place a work order for a broken device.
